data.name: Artify
data.description:
Artify is the first social-media platform of its kind, bringing NFTs to the everyday consumer through our cross-platform and cross-chain aggregator marketplace.

Artify is a pioneering social NFT platform, designed to build a community driven marketplace. Our cross-chain and cross-platform solution is unifying the fragmented NFT space. We aim to aggregate and display all the popular NFT marketplaces on one social platform. 

Artify will integrate with Polygon network to reduce GAS fees and carbon footprint. Artify is bringing the mainstream audience to the NFT space via Fiat On-Ramps and off-chain wallets that are both simple and secure. 

Artify provides a type of escrow service so that people with NFTs can swap one or more NFTs with other collectors. Most transactions will not be one-for-one NFT swaps, so Artify allows the traders to exchange the NFT and pay the difference in price either in ETH or in the $ART dedicated internal token.
The ART token features the following functionality:
NFT Swap
Swipe Swap – NFT discovery engine powered by Tinder-like swiping left and
right to view and save favorites
Cross Chain Compatibility
Ability to accept various cryptocurrencies as well as Stablecoins and Fiat
Multiple Swap capabilities (market rate, auction, demand price)
Dedicated ART token
Trusted escrow platform for NFT exchange
NFT search and discovery
Art lottery and rewards
NFT Vault
Avatar marketplace
Social communication
Platform self-governance
Marketplace aggregator (Shop cross-platform and cross-chain)
NFT Grants (Apply for funding to develop your NFT Art (Submissions are voted on by community/DAO/Governance Token
Transact using Polygon (Low Fees)
NFT Drop Alerts/Calendar (Never miss a new drop)
